overview: “The Story of Ruby Falls” is a short-film sharing the decade-long dream and love story behind the chance discovery of the cave and waterfall in 1928. The 5-minute film "celebrates curiosity of the unknown, the power of love and the joy of exploration. It invites guests to take their own unexpected journey to discover the beauty and mysteries of nature."  Source: https://www.chattanoogan.com/2020/2/12/404003/Ruby-Falls-Debuts-New-Tour-And.aspx
title: The Story of Ruby Falls
